Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Trump signed an executive order stripping the NFL of its non-profit status, when in fact the NFL voluntarily gave up that status in 2015.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the NFL's league office voluntarily gave up its tax-exempt status in 2015, as confirmed by filings with the IRS.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fabricated news story from a satirical fiction website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump took action to strip the NFL of its non-profit status in response to player protests, when there is no evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is a result of rumors and misinformation spread online following President Trump's comments on player protests.
